import { userLogin } from 'api' import React,{useState} from 'react' const Login = () => { const{loginInfo, SetLoginInfo} = useState({ uname : '', psw : '' }) const {uname,psw} = loginInfo const handleChange = e => { const{name, value} =e.target SetLoginInfo({ ...loginInfo, [name]:value }) } const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault() alert('취소클릭') } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() alert(`다음 정보로 로그인 시도 : ${JSON.stringify({...loginInfo})}`) userLogin({...loginInfo}) .then(res => {alert(`로그인 성공 : ${res.data.result}`)}) .catch(err=>{``}) } return (<>

Login Form

Forgot password?
) } export default Login
